Data Fields
vpsissIsif2DLscConfig Struct Reference

2D Lens Shading Configuration. Used to enable / disable and configure Lens shading module. More...

#include <vps_cfgisif.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t enable
 
Fvid2_CropConfig activeReg
 
Fvid2_PosConfig startPos
 
vpsissIsif2DLscDownScaleFactor_t horzDownScale

uint32_t enableOffset
 
uint32_t offsetScaleFactor
 
vpsissIsif2DLscOffsetShiftup_t offsetShiftup
 

Detailed Description

2D Lens Shading Configuration. Used to enable / disable and configure Lens shading module.

Field Documentation

Fvid2_CropConfig vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::activeReg

Used to define the active region for the LSC in the complete frame recieved by ISIF

uint32_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::enable

Flag to enable/disable LSC

uint32_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::enableOffset

TRUE: enables Offset control in LSC, offset is applied before gain. Used only for 8bit mode FALSE: disables offset in LSC

vpsissIsif2DLscGainFormat_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::gainFormat

Format of the gain entry in the table

uint32_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::gainTableAddr

Gain Table start Address, must be 4byte aligned

uint32_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::gainTablePitch

Line offset/pitch for Gain table, must be multiple of 4/42bit

vpsissIsif2DLscDownScaleFactor_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::horzDownScale

Horizontal Down scaling factor, Used to configure downscaling factor of the gain and offset table

uint32_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::offsetScaleFactor

Offset Scaling factor in U8Q7 format, Range from 0 to 1+127/128

vpsissIsif2DLscOffsetShiftup_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::offsetShiftup

Offset value, before being aplpied, is shifted by this amount and scaled up using offsetScaleFactor

uint32_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::offsetTableAddr

Offset Table Start address, must be 4byte aligned

uint32_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::offsetTablePitch

Line offset/pitch for Offset table, must be multiple of 4/42bit

Fvid2_PosConfig vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::startPos

Offset within active region, specified in complete frame Must be less than M/N down scaling factor Must be even

vpsissIsif2DLscDownScaleFactor_t vpsissIsif2DLscConfig::vertDownScale

Vertical Down scaling factor, Used to configure downscaling factor of the gain and offset table
